section.name: Multi Language Content
section.p: Magnolia does not make any guidelines about multi-languages implementations. Common used mechanisms are.

ol.li: make language trees (/en/.. /de/..). This is useful if you do not have the same content (more often than one thinks in advance).

make a tab for each language. name the attributes title_en, title_de. In the template you are able then to get the data dynamically. You will use something like
<cms:out nodeDataName="title_${language}" />

section.p: To make your dialogs itself multi-language capable or to get informations about the i18n mechanism you should go here
